name: Simulator X-Ray Head
description:
Simulator X-Ray Head
Head X-ray simulator - a game application joke, where you can do an x-ray of the head without causing harm to themselves or to anyone! CAUTION This is not a real scanner, but only the emulator, the game The game is intended for entertainment and prank your friends and family!
It is always interesting was that in your head inside or your friends? Act out your friends and family with the help of x-ray applications heads!
To use it, hover over your head or a friend or loved ones, and then scan the result of surprise! The app does not any radiation and is completely safe for your health! The result is given random!
Attention! This is not a real X-ray, it is designed to joke and play!
Thanks for playing with us, leave us your comments and suggestions, we will try to make the game even more interesting for you!
